<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barding Saddle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1565)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 88</row>

**Price** 330 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn saddle

**Bulk** 4
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This saddle is covered with well-polished metal plates on the outside and adjusts itself to fit any mount.
